name: Trials of Greed
description:
Description:

Looking for treasure? Explore the abandoned ruins  and loot your way through the treacherous paths and lurking shadows. What dangers await you...? Will you make it out safe and sound...?

Controls:

Arrow Keys | ASWD to move

E to Interact with the Doors and Loot

Made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #11!

With the Theme " A Game of Life and Death ".

Credits:

Design by: Hugo-Sousa, Catando and KiriuOzoru

Art by: KiriuOzoru

Audio and Music: Alessandro Sicardi

Programming by: Hugo-Sousa
